renderpass.code:
#define S(v)   smoothstep( 0., 3./R.y, v )              //
#define L(v)   S( .02 - abs(v) )                        //
#define mainImage( O, u )                                \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                            \
          U = ( u+u - R ) / R.y;                         \
    float x = abs(U.x), y = U.y;                         \
    O += L(y) + S(y-=.3);                                \
    y > -.3 ? O += L((x+y)/1.4) + S((y-.7+1.7*x)/2.): O; \
    O += L((++y-2.4*x)/2.6) + S(-(y-1.3*x)/1.4)
renderpass.name: Image
